en_text: Precisely. It's impossible for a child that cannot even reach his back
jp_text: そのとおりだ

en_text: to stab him in it to the hilt with a dagger.
jp_text: 短刀を根元まで刺すことは不可能
google_translated: It is impossible to stab the dagger to the root

en_text: The Fountain of Wisdom has just enlightened me. All the pieces of chaos have been reconstructed!
jp_text: 知恵の泉が語りかけた

en_text: Reconstructed? Then you must know who the real murderer is!
jp_text:
再構成されたって
じゃあ 犯人が分かったの？
google_translated:
Reconstituted
Well then, did you understand the criminal?

en_text: Even if I do, I've no means to prove it.
jp_text:
しかし 犯人が分かっても
それを証明する手だてが…
google_translated:
But even if the criminal is known
It is a hand to prove it ...

en_text: I can't hear the wolves anymore.
jp_text:
（一弥）
もう 狼の声は聞こえないね
google_translated: I can not hear the voice of the wolf

en_text: Over there!
jp_text: あっ いけない！　やめたまえ！

en_text: I got one, Ambrose!
jp_text:
（セルジウス）
しとめたぞ アンブローズ

en_text: I don't know why, but I have a bad feeling about this.
jp_text:
（一弥）何だろう
すごく嫌な予感がするんだ
google_translated:
What is it?
I have a very bad feeling
